## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT3G42950](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT3G42950)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>PGF6</u>
- **Gene Name:** Polygalacturonase Clade F 6
- **Description:**   Pectin lyase-like superfamily protein;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** locus:2078531
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*
